name: Demonbones64
description:
Conquer the Tower of Bones by customizing a pouchful of magic elemental bone chips!

Magnetize with electricity, create barriers of ice, push chips around with wind!

Try different routes to face alternate enemies and gain different rewards!

             

---Music:---
PeriTune:  Suspense 1, 2, 4, Demise, Numina, Firststep, Augury, RetroDungeon
Mark Sparling: Day 11
